events.message: I received my order yesterday, but unfortunately the item has a large scratch on the screen and some buttons are not responding.
The reported issue involves a damaged product with scratches and faulty buttons upon delivery.
The case has been assigned to a customer service representative for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear about the defect with your product and I’ll be happy to assist you.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and the non-responsive buttons so that we can evaluate the damage properly?
I have attached several clear photos showing the scratches on the screen and the buttons that do not work when pressed.
Thank you for the pictures. We can offer you a replacement unit at no extra cost or a full refund if you prefer.
I appreciate the quick response. I would prefer to receive a replacement as soon as possible.
We have processed your replacement request and the new unit will be shipped within 2 business days with tracking information provided.
Just checking in to confirm you received the replacement unit and if it is working properly without any issues.
Yes, I received the replacement yesterday and it works perfectly. Thank you for your excellent support.
We are glad your issue is resolved. We are closing the case, and feel free to contact us if you need further assistance.
